title: Hirkani Kaksha (Ladies Room) is a facility at a work place / public place where pregnant women, lactating mothers can rest and brestfeed the baby in this room
clause_text: Hirkani Kaksha (Ladies Room) is a facility at a work place / public place where pregnant women, lactating mothers can rest and brestfeed the baby in this room.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets
